actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to ensure a free and adequate education for every child who is a citizen.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Declares that, in order to more effectively promote the common defense, provide for the general welfare, and establish a more perfect union, the right to a free and adequate education shall be guaranteed to every child who is a U.S. citizen.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to ensure a free and adequate education for every child who is a citizen.
